participant_1.name: Mike Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring and humorous, Mike enjoys sharing his love for food and often uses humor to connect with others.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Emily Sanders
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit anxious, Emily loves to express herself through baking and knitting, but she often worries about the future.
participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. i have a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion.
